title: fvcking lagging everyday
body:
i dont know why the game is keep lagging everyday esp after 5pm
but im 100% sure dat my internet is good both the speed and package loss
and i can play lol with the ping under 40 for most of time, but not after 5pm 
i just had an aram game in which all  my teammates disconnected including me, and its finished within 5 mins
can riot give me some appropriate explanation? i dont want to play the game with 1000+ping 
btw, does anyone suffers the same problme?

replies.body:
I've never had these 'time-restricted' lag problems, ever.

What ISP are you with?

isp is telstra
not everyday after 5pm, but most likely. sometimes im lagging even on daytime
Do you have any entries in your automated services list?
